resources.string: JavaScript is a programming language and core technology of the web platform , alongside HTML and CSS.

Kotlin is a modern, statically typed programming language known for its conciseness, null safety, and full Java interoperation. Developed by JetBrains and officially preferred for Android development.
Java is a set of computer software and specifications that provides a software platform for developing application software and deploying it in a cross-platform computing environment.
C is a general-purpose programming language. It was created in the 1970s by Dennis Ritchie and remains widely used and influential.
